cards.name: Chris
cards.flavor_text: Has an evil doppelganger named Evil Chris. May be seen lurking about.

cards.name: Alyssa Q.
cards.flavor_text: Often assumes the form of a bumble-elf - that is a half-elf, half-bumble-bee.

cards.name: Andrea
cards.flavor_text: Found among the trees and sprites of the forests. Loves cats.

cards.name: Zach
cards.flavor_text: Rewarded most manly grizzle of our time. Spends his days defeating foes with glances.

cards.name: Maria
cards.flavor_text: Weapon of choice is throwing her dogs at foes, until they are overwhelmed by The Cute.

cards.name: MJ
cards.flavor_text: Regularly confused with George Clooney, often seen making pilgrimages to spook towns.
